summary: A guy decides to sell weed after losing his job, but things soon go out of hand as demand of business and paranoia starts taking over.
cast: Josh Brener|Alexandra Daddario|Paul Iacono|Kitty|Tyrone Marshall Brown|Tovah Feldshuh|Joe Grifasi|Todd Bartels|Al Sapienza|Lindsey Broad|Michael Rivera|Mark Feuerstein|Chris Northrop|George Pogatsia|Mark La Mura|Ebrahim Jaffer|Tao Lin|Nelson Rivera|Hal Cose|Jeff Lima|Drucie McDaniel|Benjamin Eakeley|F. title: Baked in Brooklyn
